magpie.data.utilities.filters

Class BaseDatasetFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.data.utilities.filters.BaseDatasetFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Options
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AllMetalsFilter, AttributeFilter, BestInAlloySystemFilter, ClassFilter, ClassProbabilityFilter, ClassRangeFilter, CompositionDistanceFilter, CompositionSetDistanceFilter, ContainsElementFilter, EntryRankerFilter, IQROutlierFilter, MultiFilter, PredictionOutlierFilter, PropertyRangeFilter, RegressionErrorFilter, StabilityFilter, ZScoreOutlierFilter

    public abstract class BaseDatasetFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Options
    Abstract model for classes that filter undesired entries out of a dataset. User has the ability to determine whether entries that pass a filter should be removed or kept.

    Implementations must fulfill the following operations:

    • label(magpie.data.Dataset) Generate a array defining if each entry passes the filter
    • train(magpie.data.Dataset) If needed, train before filtering
    • Options.setOptions(java.util.List<java.lang.Object>) Set options to fit the user's desires
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
